citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 a.m. on June
14, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by phone at the listed contact number. The inspector was able
to speak with the facility representative; however, they were out of town and unable to facilitate the inspection. Failure to
provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure
to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.38(b) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 a.m. on June 
14, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by phone at the listed contact number. The inspector was able 
to speak with the facility representative; however, they were out of town and unable to facilitate the inspection. Failure to 
provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure 
to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
